title: Hyggelish
info: An isometric three dimensional typeface inspired by Danish industrial design and the modularity of Lego. Explore the playful interactive lexicon of Danish words and expressions.

title: Cymbal
info: A soundtrack inspired by the traditional instruments and flavors of Turkey. Create an interactive rhythm of beats and blends.

title: Oumaima
info: Animated graphics created from particles of sand and inspired by Moroccan tradition convey the story of a teenage girl. Surf through Islam, gender and tradition.

title: Livecam
info: Installation, unedited footage obtained from security cameras throughout the nation. Edit your own version of Iran without bias.

title: Monumental
info: Video art inspired by Israeli landscape. Discover cultural diversity through fashion, dance and sculpture.
by: Roy Waks, Dana Cohen & Sapir Mashiach

title: Average Joe & Plain Jane
info: Neon light art inspired by plain Jane and average Joe. View the American lifestyle and give ordinary citizens a platform on which to shine.

title: The Divided Line
info: Interactive video inspired by Plato’s concept of duality. The divided line represents the separation of consciousness into two - the world of knowledge and senses.

title: Memorabilia
info: A collection of topographic jewelry inspired by Israeli geography. Souvenirs from the Holy land.
by: Noa Maller, Inbar Idan & Yarden Bernstein

title: Made in Brazil
info: Interactive scroll of animated collages inspired by Brazil’s geography and natural resources. The gravity of Brazil’s economic crisis is presented in a humoristic way.

title: The Ocean's Nation
info: Interactive mini site inspired by the seafaring Portuguese history. Discover the chapters of this nautical nation.

title: One day in Seoul
info: Illustration story about the life quality in SK

title: Toxic Fog
info: Video art with repetitive tempo questions the borders between the organic and the synthetic, the human and the automated, within Chinese life. Explore the effects of rapid economic growth combined with urbanization on the environment.

title: Kaleidoscope
info: Video art and motion graphics inspired by geometric shapes formed by figure skating. Kaleidoscope mirrors the discipline and determination of nine famous Russian athletes.

title: "CHE BELLA!"
info: Video clip inspired by Italy’s hypocrisy and corruption. CHE BELLA features the contrast between the stagnating economy and organized crime versus Italy the cultural superpower famous for its art, music, fashion, and iconic food.

title: Flame
info: Video clip inspired by the ‘heat’ of Mexican culture. Flame is a collection of short cuts (commercials, homemade videos and other materials) accessible online from searching the term ‘Mexico’. The temperament of the people, spicy food, violence and corruption are encapsulated into a split second, blurring the borders between cliché and truth.

title: Tiger Economy
info: Motion graphics inspired by the Korean legacy of education and focus on innovation. Tiger economy reflects how traditional expressions transform into distinctive urban lifestyle.

title: Nephele
info: Motion graphics inspired by Plato’s concept of duality. Nephele magnifies iconic objects and their cultural paradox.

title: Untraceable
info: Interactive mini site inspired by Japanese linguistics. Explore the lexicon of untranslatable words and expressions that have no English equivalent.

title: Remix
info: Interactive design based on redefining citizenship. The Israeli Declaration of Independence narrated by David Ben-Gurion is reordered and as such reconstructed.

title: Holy Guns
info: An interactive experience inspired by the global arms supply. Holy Guns addresses the massive weapon industry; an everyday commodity in a virtual market loaded with information for the buyer.
by: Neil Cohen, Adi Fleisher & Or Fleisher
